name: Grippli Warrior
languages: Grippli plus one other language (usually Common

traits.Hold Breath: The grippli can hold its breath for 20 minutes.
traits.Standing Leap: The grippli can leap 30 feet horizontally or 20 feet vertically from a standing position.

actions.Multiattack: The grippli makes one attack with its tongue. If this attack hits, the grippli can make a melee attack using its trident against the same target.
actions.Tongue: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 12+1d4 + 10). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the grippli can't grab another creature.
actions.Trident: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.
